item.title: WATCH: Japan earthquake rocks fish tanks
item.description: A powerful 7.6 magnitude earthquake struck late Monday off northern Japan, according to officials. Several people have been reportedly injured.

item.title: Trump to announce $12 billion bailout plan for farmers, White House official says
item.description: President Donald Trump is set to announce a $12 billion aid package for American farmers on Monday, a White House official confirmed to ABC News.
